articles.description: Cole Palmer has been encouraged to keep working and laughing by manager Enzo Maresca, who believes the goals will then return.
articles.title: Cole Palmer: Keep working and laughing and goals will come, Enzo Maresca tells forward

articles.description: After a slow start to the season, Crystal Palace have turned a corner with a thrashing of Aston Villa the latest sign they are on the up.
articles.title: Crystal Palace 4-1 Aston Villa: 'The mood is buzzing, the music is bouncing'

articles.description: Barcelona and Atletico Madrid draw 4-4 in the first leg of their Copa del Rey semi-final, with Alexander Sorloth netting a last-minute leveller.
articles.title: Barcelona and Atletico Madrid draw in eight-goal thriller

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text updates and match report from Celtic vs Aberdeen in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Celtic vs Aberdeen: Scottish Premiership LIVE - updates, team news, stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brighton & Hove Albion vs AFC Bournemouth in the Premier League
articles.title: Brighton 2-1 Bournemouth: Danny Welbeck earns Seagulls fourth straight victory

articles.description: Rodrigo Muniz scores a delightful chipped goal to give Fulham a 2-1 victory against Wolves at Molineux.
articles.title: Wolves 1-2 Fulham: Rodrigo Muniz chip secures victory for visitors

articles.description: Jose Mourinho's tenure at any club is guaranteed to be colourful, but his eight-month reign as Fenerbahce manager is turning caustic.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho v Turkish football - what is going on with the Fenerbahce manager?

articles.description: Arsenal will not stop fighting for the Premier League title despite slipping 11 points behind leaders Liverpool, says Gunners boss Mikel Arteta.
articles.title: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says club won't give up on Premier League title race

articles.description: Barry Ferguson speaks about his expectations, coaching staff and route to the job at his first media conference as interim Rangers manager.
articles.title: Barry Ferguson: What did we learn from Rangers unveiling?

articles.description: Kayleigh Barton's 22nd international goal earns Wales a stunning point against Sweden in the Nations League.
articles.title: Wales 1-1 Sweden: Barton penalty earns hosts stunning point
